#usage examples

= Select =

{{{
<?php
$q = new SelectQuery(array('my_table', 'another_table'));
$q->setWhere(new Condition('=', new Field('fk1', 0), new Field('id', 1)));

echo $q->sql();
}}}

will output:
{{{
SELECT `my_table`.* from `my_table`, `another_table` WHERE `my_table`.`fk1` = `another_table`.`id`
}}}
